name: Travel Riddles: Mahjong
description: Go on a puzzle-solving adventure around Europe visiting France, Italy and Greece. Enjoy beautiful locations and atmospheric music. Play classic mahjong solitaire game and recover your lost artifacts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
